channel.title: Comments on: How To Unpivot (and pivot) Like a Boss
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: David Forck (thirster42)
item.dc:creator: David Forck (thirster42)
item.description: @SQLKohai, if there's the potential of an answer not getting answered i typically greate a catch all "No Response" answer and apply that where i have missing answers.
item.content:encoded: @SQLKohai, if there’s the potential of an answer not getting answered i typically greate a catch all “No Response” answer and apply that where i have missing answers.

item.title: By: SQLKohai
item.dc:creator: SQLKohai
item.description: Just out of curiosity, how to you account for null responses? I have some in my dataset, and it doesn't bother listing the question when I do.
item.content:encoded: Just out of curiosity, how to you account for null responses? I have some in my dataset, and it doesn’t bother listing the question when I do.

item.title: By: SQLKohai
item.dc:creator: SQLKohai
item.description: this was so helpful! Thanks so much!
item.content:encoded: this was so helpful! Thanks so much!

item.title: By: SQLDenis
item.dc:creator: SQLDenis
item.description: Yep PIVOT is one of my favorite 'new' things....The other day I had to do a 2000+ column dynamic Pivot..was interesting
item.content:encoded: Yep PIVOT is one of my favorite ‘new’ things….The other day I had to do a 2000+ column dynamic Pivot..was interesting
